name: Analog Binary Code: too soon
description: Edition of 10 (plus 2 artist proofs), 2021. Token comes with a signed 8”x8” print (for primary buyers only upon request; shipping included). This Near-Future Translation -- coded in fallen young plums under their source tree, after a day of heavy wind -- is part of the #AnalogBinaryCode series by poet and artist @sashastiles, whose work merges biological and mechanical, physical and digital, ancient and futuristic in explorations of transhuman communication and transcendent possibility. sashastiles.com #TheFEN
